Package io.mrshannon.hexmek.models

Class MechBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mrshannon.hexmek.models.MechBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UnitBuilder
    public class MechBuilder
extends Object
implements UnitBuilder
    A mech builder. This implements the builder pattern to assist in making mech units.

        type - the type of the mech to build

      • build

        public Unit build​(char id,
                  HexMap map,
                  Hex hex,
                  Direction facing)
        Build the mech. This uses all of the settings set on the builder to this point.
        Multiple mech's can be built from a single builder.
        Specified by:
        build in interface UnitBuilder
        Parameters:
        id - unique, single character id of unit
        map - map to place the unit on
        hex - location to put the unit
        facing - the facing direction of the new unit
        Returns:
        a new mech using the settings from the builder and the given location and id.
